Class BoulderDashModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.BoulderDashModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoulderDashModel

    public final class BoulderDashModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements IBoulderDashModel
    The BoulderDash game Model class.
    Author:
    Gabriel RICARD AND Thibaut MAITREPIERRE

      • assignNewMap

        public void assignNewMap()
        Travels the whole map by ordinates (i1) and abscissa (i2). In the end, it returns a new map which is set in controllerMap.
